sentences.sContent: The authorities have been too pusillanimous in merely condemning the violence.
sentences.sCn: 当局过于懦弱，仅仅谴责了这场暴力行为。

synos.tran: 胆怯的；懦弱的；优柔寡断的

remMethod.val: pusill(虚弱的) ＋ anim(生命， 精神) ＋ ous → 胆小的

words.tran: 胆怯地，怯懦地；优柔寡断地

trans.tranCn: 懦弱的, 胆小的, 优柔寡断的
trans.tranOther: frightened of taking even small risks
